amendment.purpose: An amendment to ensure that, should any point of order stand against the conference report, certain provisions in the conference report relating to reductions in funding for employment and training programs and reductions in payment in administrative costs would be contained in any subsequent legislation considered by the House.

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A001) and the resolution.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Solomon amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
